<dtml-let query="buildSQLQuery(query=portal_catalog.getSecurityQuery(**kw), **kw)"
 is_translation_order_by="query['order_by_expression'] is not None and
 'translated_message' in query['order_by_expression']">
 
 <dtml-comment>
 Currently, there is no other choice to implement this method as an SQL catalog until SQLCatalog
 can support more features which are needed here. Once SQLCatalog supports those feature,
 this method should be refactored to use catalog only.
 
 The subquery is named catalog to prevent use another LEFT JOIN.
 
 XXX This query heavily depends on MySQL implementation, 
 as it seems that the "GROUP BY reference" returns the first line of the subselect 
 (which is the expected one due to "ORDER BY priority DESC").
 But, without any explicit reference of this behaviour in MySQL
 documentation, wrong results may be returned with another MySQL version.
 </dtml-comment>
 
 SELECT
 *
 FROM
 (
 SELECT
 catalog.uid,
 catalog.path,
 catalog.int_index,
 catalog.modification_date,
 catalog.reference,
 catalog.creation_date,
 catalog.title,
 CONCAT(CASE my_versioning.language
 WHEN <dtml-sqlvar language type="string"> THEN '3'
 WHEN 'en' THEN '2'
 ELSE '1' END,
 my_versioning.version) AS priority
 <dtml-if is_translation_order_by>
 , related_translation_intermediate.translated_message
 </dtml-if>
 FROM
 <dtml-in prefix="table" expr="query['from_table_list']">
 <dtml-var table_item> AS <dtml-var table_key>,
 </dtml-in>
 versioning AS my_versioning
 <dtml-if is_translation_order_by>
 , translation AS related_translation_intermediate
 </dtml-if>
 WHERE
 my_versioning.uid = catalog.uid
 <dtml-if "query['where_expression']">
 AND <dtml-var "query['where_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if all_languages>
 <dtml-else>
 AND my_versioning.language = <dtml-sqlvar language type="string">
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if is_translation_order_by>
 AND catalog.validation_state = related_translation_intermediate.original_message
 </dtml-if>
 
 ORDER BY
 priority DESC
 
 ) AS catalog
 
 GROUP BY reference
 
 <dtml-if "query['order_by_expression']">
 ORDER BY
 <dtml-if is_translation_order_by>
 translated_message
 <dtml-else>
 <dtml-var "query['order_by_expression']">
 </dtml-if>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if "query['limit_expression']">
 LIMIT <dtml-var "query['limit_expression']">
 <dtml-else>
 LIMIT 1000
 </dtml-if>
 
 </dtml-let>
